title: Boston African American National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Summer Weather Advisory - July and August 2016  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Summer Weather Advisory - July and August 2016  In the event of thunderstorms or excessive heat (90+ degrees), all walking tours are subject to modification or cancellation.  Please call (617) 742-5415 or visit our Facebook or Twitter pages for the most up-to-date information on tour cancellation.
